attributes.action: enact legislation to change English libel law which has for too long been used to stifle free expression.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: English defamation laws are almost unique in placing the burden of proof on the defendant. This situation was unsustainable even before foreign bullies started to use English courts to stifle free speech in their own countries. We call on the Prime Minister to take action to remedy this situation and to take action to ensure truly free speech exists in Britain.
